QueryResult.text: SELECT C.ID, L.ID LANGUAGE_ID, L.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE_CODE, C.COUNTRY_CODE, NLS.NAME, C.IS_ACTIVE, C.LAST_UPDATED_DATE FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES L, CMN_COUNTRIES C WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_COUNTRIES' AND NLS.PK_ID = C.ID AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = L.LANGUAGE_CODE AND L.IS_DW_ENABLED = 1
